long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 LOL2021 Currency Codes Converter & Warm Reminder Deleter! 🌟

Enhance your online shopping experience with our powerful Chrome extension! Whether you’re navigating through product pages or dealing with unwanted pop-ups, this extension has you covered. Here’s what it can do:

🌟 LOL2021 - https://lol2021.x.yupoo.com/ 🌟

💵 Real-Time Currency Conversion: Automatically convert prices from Chinese Yuan (CNY) into your preferred currencies, such as USD, PLN, EUR, GBP, and JPY. Tailor the conversions to suit your needs!

🔗 Automatic Link Conversion: Convert links to your selected platform with ease, making navigation more intuitive and direct for a smooth shopping process.

🔄 Dynamic Price Updates: Get the latest exchange rates from the web to ensure you always see accurate currency information.

🛒 Product Code Handling: Automatically update product codes to reflect your desired values based on the website, ensuring you always get the right information.

🔧 Custom Settings: Choose your favorite currencies and highlight color for converted prices. Personalize your experience for maximum convenience!

🔍 Quality Check: Easily view product images before making a purchase. Verify the quality of items through detailed images, giving you peace of mind while shopping.

🌟 Warm Reminder 🌟

🚫 Modal Removal: Effortlessly hide or remove annoying pop-ups and promotional modals that disrupt your shopping experience.

🔔 Notifications: Receive a friendly reminder when a modal is removed. Stay informed about the changes without any extra effort!
